TopicTitle: [1.4.x - 1.7.x] Nehemia Engineering Orbital Science Mods (NEOS - Micha's build) (0.8.1)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 12 hours ago, Dropbear67 said:
> 
> 
> I'm getting some errors at startup in 1.7.2 that part of this mod is not supported. Any clues or ideas if we can get a 1.7 update?
> 

Did you install the latest version (for KSP 1.6.1)? This version works well in 1.7.2 without any errors. Look at the Release-Thread:

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedauthorid="113840" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed3421582680" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/149298-14x-15x-16x-nehemia-engineering-orbital-science-neos-080/&do=embed" style="height:214px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

I've put up my work-in-progress for v0.8.1 of NEOS as a pre-release if anybody wants to test/try it:

[https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b1](https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b1)

Mostly just fixes:

\* Add bulkhead profiles to all parts (compatible with taniwha's Custom Bulkhead Profiles mod)

\* Better handling of <abbr title="Kerbal Alarm Clock (mod)">KAC</abbr> alarms, should support loading/saving now

\* Disables "Reset Experiment" for Kemini experiments (still WiP for other experiment types)

**Edited <time datetime="2019-06-23T18:03:57Z" title="06/23/2019 06:03  PM" data-short="5 yr">June 23, 2019</time> by micha**
  
Clarified version number as being for NEOS

Beta 2 is up if anybody wants to try it: [https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b2](https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b2)

\* From a user perspective, the rest of the experiments have the "Reset" button disabled.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-06-25T16:24:50Z" title="06/25/2019 04:24  PM" data-short="5 yr">June 25, 2019</time> by micha**

Beta 3 is up. [https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b3](https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b3)

- Properly fixed alarm handling for all experiments.
- Re-added Kemini support for Making History Mk2 pod.
- Fixed a localisation bug "Not enough crew in this module".

This should be the final beta.

> 
> 
> On 6/29/2019 at 3:47 PM, micha said:
> 
> 
> This should be the final beta.
> 

Famous last words!

Beta 4 is up. [https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b4](https://github.com/mwerle/OrbitalMaterialScience/releases/tag/0.8.1-b4)

- MEP experiments now animate when they are paused/resumed.
- IVA sounds only audible while in that part.

**NOTE:** Some major internal refactoring means all experiment state transitions need testing. I've concentrated mainly on the MEP as it's the most complex.

This really should be the final beta...  I'd love to fix the graphical issues "soon" but for that I need a bigger chunk of spare time to revive my rework-in-progress.

hmm a question on an old thread, will this work on 1.8.1 ? in other words, ~~does this mod include any dll file~~?

Looked into the repo, it has a dll file, maybe a recompile of the dll is needed? maybe an unofficial recompile until we get the official update please?

How can I fix it?

And apologies about lack of updates..  RL and deep in the middle of a rewrite of the UI handling.  AFAIK the current version should (somewhat surprisingly) still work and there's a beta which should definitely still work in 1.9.

Please note that this is the Development Thread.  I'll post betas here or discuss development of the mod here.

If you just want to play with the mod, please see the [Release Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?showtopic=149298).  The current release version as of this posting is NEOS 0.9.1 for KSP 1.9.1 (but should be compatible with KSP 1.8 onwards).
